content: rainbow feather and fan wavy baby blanket basic four row pattern row 1 knit row 2 k2tog six times yo p1 six times row 3 knit row 4 purl cast on multiples of 18 stitches baby blanket pattern materials required double knitting wool 4mm needles 4 5mm gives a more open texture and makes a slightly bigger blanket basic blanket pattern has six stitch garter stitch border on each side and six row garter stitch border top and bottom cast on 138 stitches in white bottom edge knit 6 row garter stitch start pattern with right side facing join in first rainbow colour and pattern as follows row 1 knit row 2 knit 6 k2tog x3 * yo p1 x6 k2tog x6 repeat from * to last 18 sts yo p1 x6 k2tog x3 knit 6 row 3 knit row 4 knit 6 purl to last 6 sts knit 6 repeat above four row twice more = three pattern repeats total garter stitch border between colours with right side facing join in white and knit 4 row garter stitch between colours colour row with right side facing join in next colour and work 12 row pattern continue with pattern as set until blanket is desired length top border knit six row white garter stitch then cast off
